root.description: The trap door opens silently. The room is bright and warm, but eerie.

exit.description: A wooden [ladder] climbs down to a trap door in the floor.

prop.description: A cackling [witch] cries some incantation in a hoarse voice.
prop.onCheck: She is fat and aged, brimming with dark magic and a vile spirit.

character.onCheck: He clenches the rungs of the [ladder] below you.
character.onTalk: Joss: "I know not which of you I despise more."
